properties.description: Connection to Key Vault for all other ADF linked service credentials required to run the processing framework.
Interact with the Azure Functions App used as middle ware when making requests to Worker pipelines. Authentication done at the Function App level.
Connection between ADF and processing framework metadata SQLDB.
Used just so the ADF.procfwk has something to call during development.

activities.name: Wait1
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.

activities.name: Raise Errors or Not
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.

properties.description: Single generic dataset used to get and set all database metadata.
ADF.procfwk infant pipeline used to check when the processing pipeline called by the Child completes and passes the resulting status back to the metadata database.

activities.name: Execute Worker Pipeline
activities.description: The lowest level executor with the metadata framework to call existing processing pipelines within Data Factory. The function called will block processing and wait for an outcome.

activities.name: Get Pipeline Params
activities.description: Returns any parameters from metadata required for the processing pipeline being called. The output can be an empty string if no parameters are required.

activities.name: Log Pipeline Running
activities.description: Sets the current pipeline with a status of running within the current execution database table.

activities.name: Get Worker Authentication Details
activities.description: Return the SPN ID and Secret for the worker pipeline being executed. Called at this level as each pipeline can have a different SPN.

activities.name: Log Execute Function Activity Failure
activities.description: Handle true failures from calling out to the Azure Function and update the current execution table accordingly so a restart can occur.

activities.name: Update Run Id
activities.description: Provide the actual ADF run ID back to the current execution table for long term logging and alignment between the metadata other Azure monitoring tools.

activities.name: Check For Alerts
activities.description: Checks the properties tables and if any recipients in the database require alerts sending for the current pipeline ID.

activities.name: Send Alerts
activities.description:
True = alerts need sending.
False = do nothing.

activities.name: Wait Until Pipeline Completes
activities.description:
Loops until the Worker pipeline called completes.

Simple status:
- Running = new iteration.
- Done = break.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Status
activities.description: Checks the status of a given processing pipeline and provides the value for the downstream framework activities to act upon.

activities.name: Wait If Running
activities.description:
True = Do nothing.
False = Wait, before the next iteration.

ifFalseActivities.name: Wait for Pipeline
ifFalseActivities.description: The processing pipeline is still running so Wait before checking its status again.

activities.name: Set Last Check DateTime
activities.description: Update the current execution table with a date time from when the Worker pipeline status was last checked as part of the Until iterations.

activities.name: Log Check Function Activity Failure
activities.description: Report to the current execution table that the framework pipeline activity has failed. This failure is outside of the scope of the framework and is probably related to a wider platform problem.

activities.name: Set Worker State
activities.description: Set the bool state of the Worker pipeline to be used by the Until and If expressions. True = Complete, False = Running.

activities.name: Set Pipeline Result
activities.description: Receives the outcome from the function execution for a given processing pipeline and updates the current execution table with different pipelines status values depending on the result (case).

activities.name: Pipeline Status Succeeded
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of success if the function outcome is succeeded.

activities.name: Pipeline Status Failed
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of failed if the function outcome is failed. Also blocks pipelines in the downstream execution stage.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Error Details
activities.description: Get the activity error details for the run ID of the worker pipeline called. Returns an array of all errors.

activities.name: Log Error Details
activities.description: Parses pipeline error details and persists them to the metadata database error log table.

activities.name: Pipeline Status Cancelled
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of cancelled if the function outcome is cancelled.

defaultActivities.name: Pipeline Status Unknown
defaultActivities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of unknown if the function returns an unexpected outcome.

activities.name: Get Wait Duration
activities.description: Return wait duration in seconds from database properties table to be used during each Until iteration when the Worker pipeline is still running.

activities.name: Set App Id
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set App Secret
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Run Id
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Details
activities.description: Return none sensitive worker pipeline information for metadata database. Including target data factory, pipeline name and resource group.

activities.name: Set Tenant Id
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Subscription Id
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Pipeline Name
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Data Factory Name
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Resource Group
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

properties.description: ADF.procfwk child pipeline used to execute Worker pipelines within a given execution stage. This pipeline will be called once for each stage, then execute all Workers in parallel.

activities.name: Get Pipelines
activities.description: Returns all pipelines from the metadata to be executed within a given processing stage.

activities.name: Execute Pipelines
activities.description: Second level ForEach to run in parallel all pipelines within the stage. Items for iteration passed from the Get Pipelines lookup activity.

activities.name: Worker Pipeline Executor
activities.description: Run the required worker pipeline and wait for its completion. Update metadata once done.

Message.value: @concat('Provided pipeline name (',pipeline().parameters.PipelineName,') still has a run in progress or queued given the query range parameters set in the properties table.')
